wire.question: Find acceleration of a block on an inclined plane connected to another via pulley (friction included). JEE Main 2021: m1=2 kg, θ=30°, m2=3 kg, g=10 m/s²
Calculate equivalent resistance between two opposite corners of a cube. JEE Advanced 2017: R=6 Ω
Time for half-charge in an RC circuit (given R, C, emf). JEE Main 2020: R=1000 Ω, C=1.442695×10⁻³ F
Particle moving in a circle with non-uniform speed – find angular acceleration. JEE Advanced 2018: r=2 m, at=6 m/s²
Find cube_root(Vr) where Vr is in cm/s.
A ball dropped in a liquid: find terminal velocity. r=0.003 m, ρs−ρf=500 kg/m³, η=0.01 Pa·s
A ball is thrown upward with velocity 20 m/s. Find maximum height (g=10).
Two resistors 4 Ω and 6 Ω are in parallel. Find equivalent resistance.
A 5 μF capacitor charged to 100 V – Find energy stored.
A 60 W bulb runs for 1 hour – Find energy used (in joules).
A current of 2 A flows through 3 Ω – Find power.
A particle completes one revolution in a circle of radius 2 m in 4 s. Find its angular speed. (JEE Main 2021)
In Young’s double slit, wavelength=600 nm, D=1 m, d=1 mm. Find fringe width (in mm). (JEE Main 2022)
Two capacitors of 6 μF and 12 μF connected in series across 12 V – Find charge on smaller capacitor. (JEE Main 2023)
Light enters from air (μ=1) to glass (μ=1.5). If angle of incidence=30°, find angle of refraction. (JEE Main 2021)
Find moles in 11 g CO₂ (M=44).
Find pH of 10⁻³ M HCl.
A radioactive sample decays from 100 g to 25 g in 20 min. Find half-life.
Find oxidation number of S in H₂SO₄.
8 g of O₂ occupies 5 L at certain T, P. Find moles per liter.
1 L of 0.1 M NaOH neutralizes how many moles of HCl.
0.5 mol of ideal gas at 27°C is heated at constant pressure so volume doubles. Find heat absorbed (R=8.3 J/mol·K). (JEE Main 2020)
0.1 M CH₃COOH has Ka=1.8×10⁻⁵ – Find pH. (JEE Main 2021)
For reaction N₂ + 3H₂ ⇌ 2NH₃, if Kp=64, find Kc at 300 K (R=0.0821). (JEE Main 2022)
2 g of gas A (M=40) occupies 1 L at 300 K – Find pressure (R=0.0821 L·atm/mol·K). (JEE Main 2023)
Solve: 2x + 5 = 11.
Find sum of first 10 natural numbers.
Find derivative of x² + 3x + 2 at x = 2.
Find distance between (1,2) and (4,6).
Find ∫2x dx from 0 to 2.
If A = {1,2,3,4,5}, find number of 3-digit numbers formed using elements of A without repetition. (JEE Main 2022)
Find area enclosed between y = x² and y = 4. (JEE Main 2023)
If tanθ = 3/4, find (sinθ + cosθ). (JEE Main 2021)
